name: Connect Pug
description:
Connect Pug is a post apocalyptic puzzle game. Playing as a telephone operator, your duty is transfer the calls from one point to another. Dragging pieces into the board while you run against the clock. Be the Hero! Help the Pugs and make them less lonely in this frenetic post apocalyptic puzzle game! But beware! The Cross Pieces doesn’t disappear after a completed call. Think and use your strategic skills to make your own way to the victory!

Made for Global Game Jam 2018

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/connect-pug
